author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...DEXTER MOVING NORTHEAST AWAY FROM THE U.S. EAST COAST WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH...
summary: ...DEXTER MOVING NORTHEAST AWAY FROM THE U.S. EAST COAST WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Aug 04 the center of Dexter was located near 35.2, -67.4 with movement NE at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...DEXTER MOVING NORTHEAST AWAY FROM THE U.S. EAST COAST WITH LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH... As of 11:00 AM AST Mon Aug 04 the center of Dexter was located near 35.2, -67.4 with movement NE at 14 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Dexter (AT4/AL042025)
